remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷唯一識別項名稱控制項。Use the property to determine the unique identifier name for the control. 在此實作中的屬性，`get`存取子會傳回的值屬性。In this implementation of the property, the `get` accessor returns the value of the property. 不過，`set`存取子不會指派給這個屬性的值。However, the `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property. > [!NOTE] > `set`存取子不會指派值給這個屬性因為屬性必須有相同的值屬性控制項才能正常運作。The `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property because the property must have the same value as the property for the control to work properly. 類別繼承自類別可能會覆寫這個實作中，，如有必要。Classes that inherit from the class may override this implementation, if necessary. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以選取頁面上控制項，並將其屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to select an control on a page and set its property. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnServerChange(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed

abstract member OnServerChange : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnServerChange : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 控制項的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

summary.span: 這個方法可讓您提供該事件的自訂處理常式。

span.span: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時的內容控制項送到伺服器的公佈間變更。The event is raised when the content of the control changes between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > 當使用者起始 post 到伺服器，例如按一下時，只會引發這個事件`submit` 按鈕。This event is only raised when the user initiates a post to the server, such as by clicking a `submit` button. 此事件不會與伺服器的 post。This event does not cause a post to the server to occur. > [!NOTE] > 控制項必須具有啟用 viewstate事件才能正確運作。The control must have viewstate enabled for the event to work correctly. 此事件通常會用來在執行資料驗證控制當使用者更新控制項中的文字。This event is commonly used to perform data validation on the control when the user updates the text in the control. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及建立的自訂事件處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and create a custom event handler for the event. 在中輸入值時，會顯示訊息控制項超過 20 個字元。A message is displayed when the value entered in the control exceeds 20 characters. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTextAreaServerChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChanged/CS/htmltextareaserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTextAreaServerChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChanged/VB/htmltextareaserverchangevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTextAreaServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChange/CS/htmltextareaserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTextAreaServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChange/VB/htmltextareaserverchangevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定或判斷的高度 （以字元為單位）控制項。Use the property to specify or determine the height (in characters) of the control. 如果您輸入的行數超過指定的高度的文字，則會啟用捲軸。If you enter text that takes up more lines than the height specified, scroll bars are enabled. 若要控制控制項的寬度，設定屬性。To control the width of the control, set the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，即可控制的高度控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the height of the control. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ServerChange As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於當 控制項的內容在發佈至伺服器期間時變更。

span.span: Occurs when the content of the control changes between posts to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時的內容控制項送到伺服器的公佈間變更。The event is raised when the content of the control changes between posts to the server. 這個事件通常用於執行資料驗證，在文字方塊上。This event is commonly used to perform data validation on the text box. > [!NOTE] > 當使用者起始到伺服器，例如按一下某篇文章時，只會引發這個事件`submit` 按鈕。This event is only raised when the user initiates a post to the server, such as clicking a `submit` button. 此事件不會與伺服器的 post。This event does not cause a post to the server to occur. > [!NOTE] > 控制項必須具有啟用 viewstate事件才能正確運作。The control must have viewstate enabled for the event to work correctly. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及建立的自訂事件處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and create a custom event handler for the event. 在中輸入值時，會顯示訊息控制項超過 10 個字元。A message is displayed when the value entered in the control exceeds 10 characters. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTextAreaServerChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChanged/CS/htmltextareaserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTextAreaServerChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChanged/VB/htmltextareaserverchangevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTextAreaServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChange/CS/htmltextareaserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTextAreaServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChange/VB/htmltextareaserverchangevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的文字輸入。

span.span: Gets or sets the text entered in the control.

value.span: 輸入於 控制項中的文字。

span.span: The text entered in the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以程式設計方式控制在文字方塊中輸入控制項。Use the property to programmatically control the text entered in the control. 這個屬性通常會用來擷取在文字方塊中，輸入的文字，但您也可以使用它來指定要在控制項中顯示的文字。This property is commonly used to retrieve the text entered in the text box, but you can also use it to specify the text to display in the control. 如果您想要提供的預設值或顯示中的訊息，這非常有用控制項。This is useful if you want to provide a default value or display a message in the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 驗證伺服器控制項語法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷內容控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the contents of the control. 內容隨即顯示在網頁中。The contents are then displayed in the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTextArea2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextArea2/CS/htmltextareacs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTextArea2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextArea2/VB/htmltextareavb.aspx#1)]
